original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2)
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya

original: 14.5. Hetuhetusampayuttaduka
analyzed: hetu hetu sampayutta duka

original: Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca dhammo
analyzed: hetum ca iva hetu sampayuttañca dhammam paṭicca na hetu ca iva na hetu vippayuttaḥ ca dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā hetum ca iva hetu sampayuttañca dhammam paṭicca na hetu vippayuttaḥ

original: ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṁ
analyzed: ca iva na na hetu ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuñca iva hetu sampayuttañca dhamma

original: paṭicca nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu ca dhammā

original: uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

original: Hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu ca
analyzed: hetu sampayuttam ca iva na ca hetum dhammam paṭicca na hetu vippayuttaḥ ca iva na na hetu ca

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu

original: ceva nahetuvippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetusampayuttañceva na ca
analyzed: ca iva na hetu vippayuttaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetu sampayuttam ca iva na ca

original: hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu
analyzed: hetum dhammam paṭicca na hetu ceva na hetu vippayutto ca na hetu vippayutto ca iva na na hetu

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu

original: ceva nahetuvippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca

original: hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu
analyzed: hetu sampayuttam ca iva na ca hetuñca dhammam paṭicca na hetu vippayuttaḥ ca iva na na hetu

original: dhammo ca uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca hetusampayuttañceva
analyzed: dhammaḥ ca uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuñca iva hetu sampayuttañca hetu sampayuttañca iva

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava. (Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṁ.)
